Time to get the power of a Dedicated Server without all those inherent single points of failure. Global organizations are rapidly adopting the power of Citrix Cloudstack and now you can too. Introducing the easy to use Citrix Cloudstack powered Cloud VPS Hosting the cloud based virtualisation platform that scales on demand to meet demands.

BENEFITS:
  • Cloudstack Portal
    Get the control you deserve with your own easy to manage control panel that gives you every tool needed to manage you virtual server with ease.

  • Rapid Provisioning
    As we don’t have to build and maintain physical servers your virtual server can be provisioned in a matter of minutes from any template of your choice.

  • Dedicated VLAN, VPN and Firewall
    All our Cloudstack customers gain full isolation from the rest of the tenants hosted on our platform you will have access to configure you Firewall rules and VPN settings directly from out portal.

  • SAN Storage
    All virtual machines run on our SAN fabric for lighting fast performance we only use the very best components and fast 15K SAS disks to ensure maximum performance.

  • SLA Backed uptime
    We can migrate your server between physical hosts with zero downtime and impact.

SPECS:

All our Cloudstack Hosts and High performance HP branded hardware. The servers have 96GB RAM 2x Quadecore CPU’s and 15K SAS disks as standard.
